Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.containers.impl

Class ModuleContainerGroupImpl

java.lang.Object
io.github.ascopes.jct.containers.impl.ModuleContainerGroupImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContainerGroup, ModuleContainerGroup, Closeable, AutoCloseable
@API(since="0.0.1", status=INTERNAL) public final class ModuleContainerGroupImpl extends Object implements ModuleContainerGroup
Simple implementation of a ModuleContainerGroup.
Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes

  • Constructor Details

    • ModuleContainerGroupImpl

      public ModuleContainerGroupImpl(JavaFileManager.Location location, String release)
      Initialize this container group.
      Parameters:
      location - the module-oriented location.
      release - the release to use for Multi-Release JARs.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if the location is not module-oriented, or is output-oriented.

  • Method Details

    • addModule

      public void addModule(String module, @WillCloseWhenClosed @WillCloseWhenClosed Container container)
      Description copied from interface: ModuleContainerGroup
      Add a container to this group.

      The provided container will be closed when this container group is closed.

      Specified by:
      addModule in interface ModuleContainerGroup
      Parameters:
      module - the module that the container is for.
      container - the container to add.

    • getClassLoader

      public ClassLoader getClassLoader()
      Description copied from interface: ContainerGroup
      Get a class loader for this group of containers.

      Note that adding additional containers to this group after accessing this class loader may result in the class loader being destroyed or re-created.

      Specified by:
      getClassLoader in interface ContainerGroup
      Returns:
      the class loader.
